divs: sighting detailssaw 2 unidentified objects in the air. hovering and stationary. recorded the event. video here:(you tube link removed to fi report field) cms 08\23\11 23:11 cst flg saw the first object (most visible in video) disappear within 5 mins of identifying and then recording. the second object was faint, stationary for longer period before it too disappeared from sight. both objects were stationary as compared to a plane flying south to north that was also captured in the same video going under the object.
